FOTO: Sanjska poroka, a z istim možem in tremi otroki
Katja Kapun je dočakala tudi cerkveno poroko, pred oltar jo je pospremil oče. Med znanimi na dogodku Poskočni muzikanti, Il Divji in Urška Vučak Markež.
03 Nov 2019, 08:58 by Mojca Marot



Katja s Poskočnimi muzikanti, ki so skrbeli tudi za zabavo na poroki. FOTO: OSEBNI ARHIV



Katja in Simon Kapun sta si drugič obljubila zvestobo v družbi treh otrok.  FOTO: OSEBNI ARHIV



Že drugič je bila nevesta v belem.  FOTO: OSEBNI ARHIV


Znani Štajerki Katji Kapun, stilistki in specialistki za trepalnice, ki je v eni sezoni Slovenskega pozdrava pri Poskočnih muzikantih nadomestila Dejana Krajnca, ko je ta nastopal v oddaji Zvezde plešejo, so se uresničile sanje. Potem ko sta se z njenim Simonom Kapunom, tudi glasbenikom, že leta 2014, ko je bila Katja noseča z dvojčkoma, civilno poročila, sta si letos, ko je Simon praznoval 40., Katja pa 30. rojstni dan, zvestobo obljubila še pred Bogom in v družbi svojih treh otrok. »Da sva dahnila v najlepši cerkvi z zanimivo zgodovino na Ptujski gori, kjer so naju pričakali glasbeni prijatelji Il Divji, zabava pa je bila v Kidričevem, kjer so za glasbo skrbeli Poskočni muzikanti,« nam je razkrila Katja, ki je blestela v obleki znane kreatorke Jerneje P. Zhembrovsky, ki oblači številne slovenske glasbenice, kot so Natalija Verboten, Nuša Derenda, Alya in druge. Za nevestino frizuro je poskrbel Kristijan Skamljič, ki je friziral tudi Severino, za make up pa Eva C. Zimet, znana vizažistka in Katjina najboljša prijateljica. Kakopak niso manjkali znani, kot so Urška Vučak Markež, glasbenik Rusko Richie in Stančka Šukalo, Damijan Murko s svojo Majo, Martina Gominšek z možem Urbanom, pa župan Svete Trojice David Klobasa in številni Katjini poslovni prijatelji. »Za zabavo so poleg Murka skrbeli še Rusko, ki nama je za to priložnost napisal posebno pesem Najin dan, ki sva jo tudi zapela, Tomaž Gorenšek, ki je s Simonom igral v avstrijskem ansamblu Juchee, pa Sandi Firbas in Zlatih 6 ter Ervin Matjašič, ki je s Simonom igral v njegovem prvem ansamblu Šank Kvintet. Nemogoče je našteti vse, ki so poskrbeli, da je bil ta dan res sanjski in se mi je uresničila želja, da me je pred oltar, kot nevesto v belem, pospremil moj oče,« je za Slovenske novice razkrila Katja, ki je neizmerno hvaležna številnim poslovnim prijateljem, ki jo bodrijo v težkih trenutkih.


Katja in Simon Kapun sta si drugič obljubila zvestobo v družbi treh otrok.  FOTO: OSEBNI ARHIV

Ni skrivnost, da se Katja že od leta 2010 bori z depresijo in napadi panike, a ji o tem ni težko govoriti na glas. »Življenje ni samo pravljica, je tudi trnova pot, a meni na tej poti pomagajo številni, zato je vse lažje,« pravi Katja, ki jo ljudje na ulici še vedno prepoznavajo tudi kot poskočno Katjo, ko je namesto Dejana Krajnca s Poskočnimi muzikanti igrala klarinet. Zdaj je na svoji poroki tudi zapela in s pesmijo Najin dan presenetila vse, preden sta s Simonom zarezala v poročno torto. »Nasploh je bila poroka zelo čustvena in hvaležna sem prijatelju in članu poskočnih Lovru Sadeku, ki je poskrbel, poleg najine ožje družine, da je bilo vse popolno,« pravi Katja, ki ima za seboj naporno leto, saj je na samostojno pot pospremila kar nekaj novih stilistk za trepalnice. Zdaj jo čakajo intenzivne priprave na drugo mednarodno konferenco, ki jo bo s prijateljico vizažistko Evo C. Zimet organizirala v Sloveniji, prvič pa bo pri nas tekmovanje oblikovanja obrvi in trepalnic ter make upa. »Najbolj sem vesela, da sem našla takšnega sopotnika, kot je moj mož Simon, in ob najinih treh sončkih lahko rečem, da sem najsrečnejša ženska na svetu,« pravi. 


Že drugič je bila nevesta v belem.  FOTO: OSEBNI ARHIV

PHOTO: A Dream Wedding, but with the Same Husband and Three Children
Katja Kapun also attended a church wedding, accompanied by her father at the altar. Famous at the event are the Pop musicians, Il Divji and Urška Vučak Markež.
03 Nov 2019, 08:58 by Mojca Marot



Katja with the Jumping Musicians, who also took care of the wedding party. PHOTO: PERSONAL ARCHIVE



Katja and Simon Kapun pledged their loyalty to the company of three children for the second time. PHOTO: PERSONAL ARCHIVE



For the second time, the bride was in white. PHOTO: PERSONAL ARCHIVE


The famous Styrian Katja Kapun, an eyelash stylist and specialist who replaced Dejan Krajnc in one season of the Slovenian Greetings with the Jumping Musicians when she appeared in the show The Stars Dance, a dream come true. After she and her husband Simon Kapun, also a musician, made a civil marriage in 2014, when Katja was pregnant with twins, this year, when Simon celebrated her 40th birthday and Katja's 30th birthday, she pledged her loyalty before God. and in the company of her three children. "That we were breathing in the most beautiful church with an interesting history on Mount Ptuj, where music friends Il Divji were waiting for us, and the party was in Kidričevo, where the musicians were taking care of music," revealed Katja, who sparkled in the famous dress creator Jerne P. Zhembrovsky, who dresses many Slovene musicians, such as Natalia Verboten, Nuša Derenda, Alya and others. The bride's hairstyle was taken care of by Kristijan Skamljič, who also did Severina's hairstyle, and Eva C. Zimet, a famous makeup artist and Katja's best friend, makeup. Famous people, such as Urška Vučak Markež, musician Rusko Richie and Stančka Šukalo, Damijan Murko with his Maya, Martina Gominšek with her husband Urban, and Holy Trinity Mayor David Klobasa and many of Katja's business friends, were certainly not missing. “In addition to Murko, the party was also entertained by Russia, who wrote a special song Our Day for Us, which we also sang, Tomaž Gorenšek, who played with Simon in the Austrian Juchee ensemble, Sandi Firbas and Zlatih 6, and Ervin Matjašič , who played with Simon in his first ensemble, Shank Quintet. It is impossible to enumerate all those who made sure that this day was really a dream and that my wish came true that I was accompanied by my father in front of the altar, like a bride in white, "Katja, who is immensely grateful, told Slovenian News many business friends who cheer her on in difficult times.


Katja and Simon Kapun pledged their loyalty to the company of three children for the second time. PHOTO: PERSONAL ARCHIVE

It's no secret that Katja has been battling depression and panic attacks since 2010, but it's not hard to talk about it out loud. "Life is not just a fairy tale, it is also a thorny path, but many people help me along the way," says Katja, who is still recognized by people on the street as a jumping Katja when she played with Jumping musicians instead of Dejan Krajnc clarinet. Now, at her wedding, she also sang and surprised everyone with the song Our Day before she and Simon cut into the wedding cake. "In general, the wedding was very emotional, and I am grateful to my friend and family member Lovro Sadek, who made sure, in addition to our immediate family, that everything was perfect," says Katja, who has had a difficult year behind her as she set off on her own some new eyelash stylists. Intense preparations are now awaiting her for the second international conference, which she and her friend Makeup artist Eva C. Zimet will organize in Slovenia. "I am most pleased to have found such a companion as my husband Simon, and with our three suns I can say that I am the luckiest woman in the world," she says.


For the second time, the bride was in white. PHOTO: PERSONAL ARCHIVE

Life is not just a fairy tale, it is also a thorny path.
